appendix.title: Postgres Versions
appendix.simpara: The Eureka Streams SQL scripts use syntax specific to Postgres 8.4. Attempting to run dev_reset_db.sh on Postgres 8.3 results in syntax errors:
appendix.screen: psql:/home/eurekastreams/tmp/2010-08-15-130638.sql:4518: ERROR: syntax error at or near "DATA" LINE 1: ...LE
appendix.simpara: The file /home/eurekastreams/tmp/2010-08-15-130638.sql, line 4518, contains an ALTER TABLE statement as shown here with several lines of context:
The full spew is shown here:
